README.html.title: TheBabelBridge-TowerOfTongues | BabelBridge-TowerOfTongues
README.html.summary: TheBabelBridge-TowerOfTongues The Babel Bridge - Tower of Tongues is about a website where the first point is to play crossword puzzles online with multiple people.

SECURITY.html.title: Security Policy | BabelBridge-TowerOfTongues
SECURITY.html.summary: Security Policy Reporting a Vulnerability If you discover a security vulnerability, please contact us at security@babelbridge.com. We will respond as quickly as possible to address the issue. Acknowledgments We appreciate the efforts of security researchers and are happy to acknowledge their contributions on our Hall of Fame page. See it at https://www.BabelBridge.com/Hall-of-Fame-Security Preferred Languages We accept vulnerability reports in English (en), Dutch (nl), and Japanese (jp). Additional Information Hiring: https://www.BabelBridge.com/security-jobs CSAF Provider Metadata: https://www.www.BabelBridge.com//.well-known/csaf/provider-metadata.json
